title: cannot browse folders containing files and folders with special characters in windows
body:
using windows 7, iis 7.5, oc 5.0.3, i can't use local mount via the external storage app on any folders with actual content, because any of them breaks the whole loading process, just displays a blank page.

it doesn't work via webdav mount in windows 7, either. 

mounting via ftp also gives http 500 server error, and empty folders via webdav when browsing the ftp-folder.

here're a sample of the log lines that are repeating when i try to open one of these kinds of folders (seems like the same as here: https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/94 ):

fatal php sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 1366 incorrect string value: '\xc5r.med...' for column 'logic_path' at row 1 at c:\inetpub\wwwroot\owncloud\lib\db.php#965

maybe this can be of help for debugging? there's someone experiencing something similar on drupal, maybe not exactly the same though: http://drupal.org/node/1140194

seems that the issue happens as soon as some file with a special character is found, owncloud just cuts out. i shared a directory with only english name files and folders, and it was the only folder on my server that worked, all others contained some norwegian or other special characters, and those just came up as empty in windows explorer or blank page in web.
